titleStmt.title: Endimion· An excellent fancy first composed in French by Monsieur Gombauld. And now elegantly interpreted, by Richard Hurst Gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Gombauld, Jean Ogier de, d. 1666.
Passe, Crispijn van de, ca. 1565-1637, ill.
Gaultier, Léonard, 1561-1641, engraver.
Picart, Jean, ill.
Hurst, Richard.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. Okes, for Samuel Browne, and are to be sold in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Fountaine,

notesStmt.note: With an additional title page, engraved: L'Endimion de Gombauld Englished ..
With an imprimatur on A1. Variant 1: lacking imprimatur. Variant 2: imprimatur printed on verso of engraved title page. Variant 3: imprint date in arabic numerals.
The engraved illustrations are from the same plates as the French edition of 1624, and are variously signed by Léonard Gaultier, Crispijn van de Passe, and Jean Picart.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
